entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light late in the morning. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
